name: Hubspace
0:
”Alexa, turn on the bedroom light”
”Alexa, set the kitchen to daylight”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can use the Hubspace Skill for Amazon Alexa to control your Hubspace products.

To get started:

1. Download the Hubspace app from the Apple App Store or the Google Play Store. 
2. Sign in to Hubspace.
3. Link your accounts. 

You can issue all sorts of voice commands to your Hubspace devices, including:

“Alexa, turn on kitchen light”

“Alexa, dim the bathroom light.”

“Alexa, set the bedroom light to fifty percent.”

“Alexa, change the living room light to blue”

“Alexa, set the dining room softer.”

“Alexa, make the living room warmer.”

“Alexa, set the dining room cooler.”

“Alexa, set the kitchen to daylight.”

Please note for Fanelee ceiling fans with CCT support, the light must be turned on to change the white temperature.
